name: Furred Up
description: Tribbles are spreading unchecked across every timeline and universe, on track to end the temporal anomaly crisis as promised... by choking out all other life! Track down and consult tribble experts to find a solution.
rules:
-- Unique Federation Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Sulu, Sato, Odo, Exobiologists, Tribble Kirk or crew with the Tribbled trait will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Sulu, Sato, Odo, Tribbled, Exobiologists or Tribble Kirk
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Chekov
featured_crew.flavor: Chekov accompanies Uhura to the bar aboard Deep Space K-7, where they see a tribble for the very first time.

featured_crew.name: Sato
featured_crew.flavor: Cute furry tribbles give Hoshi only evoke feelings affection

featured_crew.name: Odo
featured_crew.flavor: Disguised as a trader, Odo joined the Defiant crew in preventing the assassination of Captain Kirk by a time-traveling Klingon.

rewards.name: Federation Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Federation faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Phlox
rewards.flavor: Chief Medical Officer of the Enterprise, Phlox was a lifelong learner of every medical art.

rewards.name: Federation Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Federation faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Chekov
rewards.flavor: Chekov accompanies Uhura to the bar aboard Deep Space K-7, where they see a tribble for the very first time.

rewards.name: Odo
rewards.flavor: Disguised as a trader, Odo joined the Defiant crew in preventing the assassination of Captain Kirk by a time-traveling Klingon.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Disguised as a trader, Odo joined the Defiant crew in preventing the assassination of Captain Kirk by a time-traveling Klingon.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

screens.text: "We have a working theory on how Larkin was able to get tribbles into every timeline and universe, but it's going to take time to turn that theory into an action plan."
"The process might go faster if we had more tribble expertise. Many of us have encountered tribbles before... but I'm sorry to say, done little more than pet them."

"I'll go further than that. We're going to find anyone who knows anything about these creatures. They're going to help us, or be made to help us--and then punished for trafficking these pests knowing full well the dangers."
"We have a working theory on how Larkin was able to get tribbles into every timeline and universe, but it's going to take time to turn that theory into an action plan."
"The process might go faster if we had more tribble expertise. Many of us have encountered tribbles before... but I'm sorry to say, done little more than pet them."

"I'll go further than that. We're going to find anyone who knows anything about these creatures. They're going to help us, or be made to help us--and then punished for trafficking these pests knowing full well the dangers."
"We have a working theory on how Larkin was able to get tribbles into every timeline and universe, but it's going to take time to turn that theory into an action plan."
"The process might go faster if we had more tribble expertise. Many of us have encountered tribbles before... but I'm sorry to say, done little more than pet them."

"I'll go further than that. We're going to find anyone who knows anything about these creatures. They're going to help us, or be made to help us--and then punished for trafficking these pests knowing full well the dangers."
"We have a working theory on how Larkin was able to get tribbles into every timeline and universe, but it's going to take time to turn that theory into an action plan."
"The process might go faster if we had more tribble expertise. Many of us have encountered tribbles before... but I'm sorry to say, done little more than pet them."

"I'll go further than that. We're going to find anyone who knows anything about these creatures. They're going to help us, or be made to help us--and then punished for trafficking these pests knowing full well the dangers."
